metadata.title: CVE-2014-2957 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: The dmarc_process function in dmarc.c in Exim before 4.82.1, whenEXPERIMENTAL_DMARC is enabled, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrarycode via the From header in an email, which is passed to the expand_stringfunction.

criterions.comment: exim4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
